Dinari Sabra LE Benefits for Terminated Employees Cc We are mailing out the termination packages Monday and Tuesday The check minus appropriate deductions will be mailed out Monday However the typical process for Towers Perrin to distribute cash balance amounts to former employees does take to days We cannot accelerate this process given the court proceedings Original Message From Dietrich Janet Sent Friday December AM To Pieper Kalen Oxley David Cc Hall Bob M Kitchen Louise Lavorato John Black Don Olson Cindy Dinari Sabra L Subject FW Benefits for Terminated Employees Importance High KalenDavid What are the facts surrounding this process Surely what is outlined below cant be accurateif it is we need to figure out what can be done to shorten the timeframe Please respond directly to Sabra L Dinari and copy me Thanks Original Message From Dinari Sabra L Sent Thursday December PM To Hall Bob M Kitchen Louise Lavorato John Black Don Dietrich Janet Subject Benefits for Terminated Employees Importance High Hi all I just got off the phone with the Benefits Center and they are informing people that it could take up to days for them to send termination packages out to these employees and then you can send in your forms and it will take another days to get a check specifically talking about the Cash Balance Plan money This all happens AFTER they get a notice that you are terminated which they usually process on the stcome on what is up with this It could very well take up to months for people to get a check in their hands That is not right Since all of you have a lot more clout than me or any of the terminated employees Im hoping that someone will take this up with Human Resources or whomever to get this form downloadable or something to speed up this process Thanks Sabra Dinari

RE Steve Montovanowill do Original Message From Shapiro Richard Sent Wednesday November AM To Pieper Kalen Subject Steve Montovano Importance High Sensitivity Confidential Steve will be staying so lets move the no to yes Thanks

RE Home Sale EquityDavid It is one of the priorities on our lawyers plate They are meeting with WG today and hope to get an answer then Original Message From Oxley David Sent Monday December AM To Pieper Kalen Orourke Tim Taylor Diane Subject FW Home Sale Equity Original Message From Hartmann John Sent Monday December AM To Whiteurst Lloyd Taylor Diane Cc Oxley David Moss Kevin Subject Home Sale Equity Lloyd Diane I would like to get status on the payment to me for my home equity Thanks

FW Deductions Cc timoOriginal Message From Wheeler Terrie Sent Wednesday December PM To Jones Robert W HR Exec Oxley David Joyce Mary Cc Pieper Kalen Subject Deductions To All Just a heads up that the current payroll deductions we are processing include Taxes Benefits Until Cynthia notifies us otherwise k United Way But Enron is no longer matching this amount were getting a lot of dropouts Child Care Garnishments Accounts Receivable Balances due Enron Parking Weve discontinued deductions related to Body ShopMet ClubRiver Athletic Club EnergizerMarriott PAC Savings Bonds University Donations Enron Share Purchases Direct Service Auto Repair Executive Car Care We or the Program Sponsor have notified the participants by eMail of discontinuance Amounts will be refunded on payroll if any for deductions taken that were not remitted to these vendors In addition weve discontinued paymentsreimbursements and imputed income related to Executive Physicals Cash Flex Perks Club Dues ClickatHome Weil Gotshal said ok since CAH team is gone and amount is small Metro Mass Transit No more free parking tickets Employees must pay for out of their pocket Terrie

FW Enron Matching Gifts Cc Diane Im assuming that these are not being paid Michelle do you have any idea if she could get out of her commitment Im assuming that she really isnt liable for the match Original Message From Mayes Fran Sent Wednesday December PM To Pieper Kalen Subject FW Enron Matching Gifts Kalen Can you help me with this answer Fran Original Message From Elizabeth Hutchinson ENRON Sent Wed AM To Mayes Fran Cc Subject Enron Matching Gifts Hi Fran I know you must be really bogged down with questions so my apologies in advance for bugging you but if you could track down an answer for me it would be much appreciated I am running the Houston Marathon for the Leukemia Society I made a fundraising commitment of I have raised and have been waiting for the Enron match of from the matching gifts program The request was submitted well in advance of the cutoff deadline that was announced via email a few weeks before the layoffs The Leukemia Society has not yet received the match If Enron does not come up with the match I am personally on the hook for this and in light of the small severance situation it is going to be really tough for me right now Do you have any information on whether or not the Enron commitment will be honored as was communicated in the email Do you have any idea when the funds will be sent to the Leukemia Society Any information you can provide right now will be much appreciated so that I can pass it along to the Leukemia Society Thank you Elizabeth Hutchinson

additional QAsQ I am on a HB Visa What assistance is the company providing me A Enron is required to pay for a oneway coach ticket for the employee only Please contact for necessary arrangements Michelle what else can we say about timing when we submitted names to the INS etc Q Will I be able to receive severance in the future if I file for unemployment A There is no company offset for State unemployment benefits against the You are able to file for unemployment immediately after your termination date If you receive additional severance in the future it will be offset by any unemployment wages you have received Q Will I be paid for any unused vacation weve already answered this broadly but are getting a ton of specific questions around vacation now bc they are thinking that it is being treated as an expense A The payment included payment for all prepetition compensation including unused vacation time WARN notification and incentive and overtime pay Employees are entitled to pursue any claims for amounts in excess of in the bankruptcy proceeding The link for the claim form is included below

RE Consumer Feedback to Enron Corp from Meredith StewartTerrieCindy Once you all finalize the general letter it would probably be an appropriate response here it wont make her feel any better but it will at least acknowledge that we received her complaint Original Message From Denne Karen Sent Friday December AM To Pieper Kalen Olson Cindy Orourke Tim Subject FW Consumer Feedback to Enron Corp from Meredith Stewart fyi Original Message From Radford Pat Sent Friday December AM To Denne Karen Subject FW Consumer Feedback to Enron Corp from Meredith Stewart Interesting letter below Original Message From Meredith Stewart ENRON Sent Thursday December PM To Jeffrey K Skilling Subject Consumer Feedback to Enron Corp from Meredith Stewart Type of Feedback Complaint Feedback Category Overall Experience This letter is being sent to your company by PlanetFeedbackcom at the request of Meredith Stewart If there is a cc list at the end of the letter the people on the list also have received a copy PlanetFeedbackcom is free service that gives consumers the online tools they need to send feedback to companies easily and quickly If appropriate we recommend that you respond to this consumers letter When you do please send a copy of your response to fax it to or mail it to PlanetFeedback Main St Cincinnati OH Sorry we cant reply to that email address Contact us through our Web site if you have other issues to discuss December TO Jeffrey K Skilling CEO Enron Corp PO Box Houston TX FROM Meredith Stewart Gray St Apt Houston TX RE PLANETFEEDBACK REFERENCE NUMBER Dear Mr Skilling Id like to bring your attention to a complaint I have with your companys overall experience I know you appreciate your customers and want to keep them happy so I am certain youll want to address this quickly This incident has infuriated me Heres the problem How DARE you treat your former employees the way you have in the last three weeks To throw employees who have devoted their lives to make your company great out on the street with no severance and trying to get out of the WARN act is a disgrace We were told to wait out the bankrupty and you would be petitioning the court for a severence in addition to the measly we received Its been like pulling teeth to get information about our termination date unemployment insurance and all of our unanswered questions And to top it all off you gave YOURSELVES million dollars in BONUSES Meanwhile there are former employees out there that have lost their entire retirement kids who arent getting a Christmas this year and families having to sell their homes How do you sleep at night My situation isnt as bad as some but I got screwed nonetheless With only a year of experience all at Enron Im having an EXTREMELY hard time competing with the talented Enron exes I have a wedding in six months student loans a car note credit card debt and I was FOUR DAYS AWAY from closing on a new house that I cant get anymore because I dont have a job Frivilous maybe but I dont know what Im supposed to do now with no benefits and desperately trying to fight depression which doesnt make this any easier I hope the bankruptcy court Heres what Id like to see happen Just pay all the employees youve laid off since November the severance you kept telling us we would get That and any outstanding monies that the didnt cover this includes payment for our unused vacation time We will NOT let you get away with this My overall experiences with your company have been extremely negative This incident has discouraged me I definitely wont recommend you to any of my family or friends Again I am sure you are interested in satisfying your customers so I hope youll move quickly on this complaint Thanks Sincerely Meredith Stewart CC Jose Lazo Smithcom Sheila JacksonLee Phil Gramm Kay Bailey Hutchison Henry Cuellar COMPANY RATINGS PlanetFeedbackcom compiles ratings on companies based on the opinions and satisfaction levels of consumers To see how your company stacks up or to see how your competitors are doing please click on ratings To find out how PlanetFeedbackcom creates and updates the company ratings click on ratingslearnmore WHAT WE OFFER As a service to businesses PlanetFeedback offers ExpressFeedback a faster and more efficient way to handle Webbased consumer feedback The benefit to companies Increased revenue lower costs associated with handling realtime feedback enhanced consumer insight and satisfied more loyal customers ExpressFeedback can be up and running in a matter of weeks For more information and a emonstration of ExpressFeedback please visit PlanetFeedbacks business Web site at biz email us at or call sales at IS THIS LETTER FINDING ITS WAY TO YOU CORRECTLY We want to be sure that this consumer letter finds it way to you smoothly All PlanetFeedback letters are addressed to your companys CEO but if someone else on your staff is better equipped to handle customer feedback please send the correct contact information for that email account and well direct the letter accordingly Email the correct information to fax it to or mail it to PlanetFeedback Main St Cincinnati OH Please include the name of your company Thanks QUESTIONS or COMMENTS If you have questions about how PlanetFeedbackcom works or how to respond to this letter youll find the answers to most of your questions on our FAQ page at bizresources CONTACT US You can also email us at or call us at FEEDBACK or We will help you however we can Were open to your suggestions for improving our service Thanks

FW CONFIDENTIAL Insider trading charges leviedhow have we handled in the past Original Message From Earle Joseph Sent Friday November AM To Sullivan Kriste Pieper Kalen Cc Sharp Vicki Subject CONFIDENTIAL Insider trading charges levied FYIVicki Sharp requested that I forward this email to you I previously forwarded this to Peggy Mahoney and Dan Leff Peggy said she would advise Corp Forwarded by Joseph E EarleHOUEES on AM Marty Keyser AM To Joseph E ES Vicki ES cc Subject CONFIDENTIAL Insider trading charges levied Joe and Vicki As we discussed attached is the article that appeared in the Philadelphia Inquirer this morning regarding the civil complaint filed against Joseph F Doody who is currently Eastern Region President and a Director of Limbach Facility Services Inc I received this Article from our local counsel at Schnader Harrison in Philadelphia Let me know if there is anything I should do Marty Forwarded by Marty KeyserEFSEES on AM McBride Ed on AM To cc Subject Insider trading charges levied Insider trading charges leviedhtml Insider trading charges leviedhtml Embedded Picture Metafile Embedded Picture Device Independent Bitmap
